parameter.name: refresh
parameter.label: interval (s)
parameter.description: Poll interval in seconds. Use zero to disable automatic polling.

parameter.name: address
parameter.label: Start address
parameter.description: Start address of the model block

parameter.name: length
parameter.label: Block length
parameter.description: Length of the model block in 2 byte words

parameter.name: maxTries
parameter.label: Maximum tries when reading
parameter.description: Number of tries when reading data, if some of the reading fail. For single try, enter 1.
